getSponsored.description: Get sponsored by linking with an app that offers sponsorship

joinConnectionPartyWithFriend.title: Connection party with friends or family

linkApp.description: Link your BrightID with an app
linkApp.title: Link with an app

setupBackup.description: Set password to enable encrypted backup of your data
setupBackup.title: Set backup password

setupTrustedConnections.title: Setup social recovery

text.checkWebsite: To find out more about {{name}}, check out their website!
text.linkApp: Do you want to link your account in {{context}} to your BrightID?
text.linkFailure:
Failed to link your account in {{context}} to your BrightID
{{result}}
text.linkSuccess: Succesfully linked your account in {{context}} to your BrightID

text.notSponsored:
You're not sponsored.
Please find an app below to sponsor you.
text.pendingLink: Linking your account in {{context}} to your BrightID…

text.completed: Social recovery of your BrightID is now enabled
text.needThreeTrusted: You need at least three recovery connections for backup.

text.chooseTrustedConnections: Choose three or more recovery connections to back up your BrightID.

text.localOutdated: client version outdated - please update your client and retry
text.otherOutdated: other client version outdated - QRCode creator needs to update client and retry

actionSheet.title: What do you want to do?

text.lostKeys: Please create a new BrightID or try recovering your previous BrightID
text.passwordMatch: Password and confirm password does not match.
text.passwordShort: Your password must be at least 8 characters long.
text.trustedSigned: One of your recovery connections signed your request

title.lostKeys: We've lost the BrightID keypair from the device

camera.message: We need your permission to use your camera
camera.title: Permission to use camera

text.uploadingData: Uploading encrypted data to backup server…

text.levelJustMet: This person is a stranger I just met
text.levelRecovery: I trust this person to recover my BrightID for me
text.levelSuspicious: I don't know this person at all
text.reportImpact: Flagging {{name}} will negatively effect their BrightID score, and this flag might be shown to other users.
text.unReportImpact: You have already reported {{name}} as a {{reportReason}}. Would you like to remove this flag and restore your connection?
text.reportSpammer: This person sent me an unwanted connection request

removeActionSheet.info: Are you sure you want to remove connection with {{name}}? You can reconnect anytime.
removeActionSheet.title: Remove connection

text.nameMissing: Please add a name for group
text.nameTooShort: The group name must be at least 2 characters

text.cofounders: To create a group, you must select two co-founders

text.backupRequired: Setting up backup and recovery is required to access your graph explorer code. Check your notifications or connect to more users to be eligible for backup and recovery.
text.explorerWebsiteDescription: is a website designed to explore the entire BrightID social graph. Use the code above to see your connections in the graph.

text.addAdmin: Are you sure you want to make {{name}} an admin for this group?
text.dismissMember: Are you sure you want to dismiss {{name}} from this group?
text.inviteSuccess: You invited {{name}} successfully to the group
text.leaveGroup: Are you sure you want to leave this group?

title.errorDismissMember: Error dismissing member from the group

text.noEligibleConnection: No existing connections are eligible for this group, please come back later..

text.backupPassword: Set a password to enable encrypted backup of your data
text.socialRecovery: Choose recovery connections to enable social recovery of your BrightID

text.rejectGroupInvite: Are you sure you want to reject joining this group?

msg.backupBrightId: Set a password to enable encrypted backup of your data
msg.socialRecovery: Choose recovery connections to enable social recovery of your BrightID

text.congratulations:
Congratulations!
Your BrightID has been created.
It’s time to make connections.
text.register:
Register to create your very own
digital identity

text.errorCreateChannel: Could not create connection channel. Error message: {{message}}
text.errorJoinChannel: Could not join connection channel. Error message: {{message}}
text.localOutdated: Can't connect with {{name}} due to incompatible client version. Please update and restart your brightID app.
text.otherOutdated: Can't connect with {{name}} due to incompatible client version. Please ask {{name}} to update and restart the brightID app.

text.errorExpired: The connection expired. Please try to reconnect.
text.errorMyself: You can not connect to yourself.

label.rating: How well do you know this connection?

text.errorGeneric: Error while connecting. Please try to reconnect.
text.rating: Your answer will help us prevent attacks

text.discardChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them and leave the screen?

alert.connectGroup: Make a group connection with {{name}} on BrightID: {{link}}

text.codeGroup: This QR code is designed for many people to connect simultaneously.
text.codeSingle: This QR code can be used to connect with a single user before it expires.
text.shareLinkSingle: Share this link with one friend

text.scanCode: <text>Hey {{name}}, scan a code and</text><text>make a new connection today</text>

alert.text: Share this link with your recovery connections.
alert.title: Recovery link

error.mismatchId: Your recovery connections selected different accounts
error.title: Account recovery failed

recovery.info: This step will recover your BrightID on this device. Names and photos of connections in common with your recovery connections will be restored.

text.additionalInfo: Your recovery connections will need to scan this to help you recover your BrightID
text.askTrustedConnections: Please show this QR code to your recovery connections

text.connection: You just changed the recovery level of <bold>{{name}}</bold>.
text.cooldown: Note that this change takes effect after a cooldown period of <period>{{ cooldownPeriod }}</period> for security reasons.
text.cooldownGeneric: Note that change of recovery connections takes effect after a cooldown period of up to <period>{{ cooldownPeriod }}</period> for security reasons.

text.requestRecovering: Your request to help recovering this account submitted successfully!
text.restoreConfirm: Is {{name}} the account you are helping to recover?

text.nobodyHasChosen:
Unable to recover connection...
They did not set you as recovery

restore.info: With your backup password you can restore names and photos of all your connections and groups.

text.chooseConnectionToHelp: Please select the connection whose account you are helping to recover.

text.nameNotShared:
Your name will never be shared with apps or
stored on our blockchain.
text.passwordInfo: This password will encrypt the names and photos of your connections should you need to recover them. It does not allow someone to take over your BrightID.
text.photoNotShared:
Your photo will never be shared with apps or
stored on our blockchain.
text.whatsYouName: What do your friends know you by?

text.setPassword:
You can always set your
BrightID password in here
